task_description: Develop a responsive login page for the application.
Design and implement the mentee dashboard interface.
Develop the main navigation bar for the app.
Improve the frontend performance and loading speed.
Connect backend APIs with frontend components.
Create login and registration APIs with token-based authentication.
Implement APIs for creating, reading, updating, and deleting users.
Design the database schema for Mentory.
Develop APIs for sending user notifications.
Optimize database queries for better performance.
Implement APIs for mentor payment processing.
Create a modern and engaging landing page for Mentory.
Design user flow diagrams for smooth navigation.
Design the mentee dashboard with focus on UX.
Design and prepare icon assets for the application.
Build an interactive prototype in Figma.
Setup a staging server for testing and deployment.
Implement CI/CD for automated deployments.
Setup database backup and recovery systems.
Implement monitoring tools for server performance.
Configure server security settings.
Deploy the application to the production server.
Test load balancing configurations.
Develop unit tests for backend APIs.
Test frontend UI on multiple devices.
Develop integration tests for API and frontend.
Document all bugs found during testing.
Perform regression testing for each release.
Develop the user profile page with responsive design.
Implement notification system in the frontend.
Optimize the UI for all screen sizes.
Add realtime chat feature to the frontend.
Develop a dropdown menu for notifications.
Build backend APIs for realtime chat.
Set up user roles and access permissions.
Develop APIs for analytics and reports.
Improve backend API response time.
Implement WebSocket server for realtime communication.
